name: Elegant Black Hijab
description: A timeless black hijab made of soft chiffon material, perfect for any occasion. This elegant piece combines traditional modesty with contemporary style.

name: Rose Garden Hijab
description: Delicate floral patterns in soft rose tones, made from premium silk blend. Perfect for special occasions and everyday elegance.

name: Golden Hour Hijab
description: Luxurious silk blend in warm golden tones, perfect for special occasions. The shimmering finish adds a touch of sophistication.

name: Ocean Breeze Hijab
description: Elegant navy blue with subtle shimmer, crafted from breathable cotton. Ideal for both professional and casual settings.

name: Ivory Dreams Hijab
description: Pure ivory with delicate lace trim, perfect for weddings and formal events. The luxurious fabric drapes beautifully.

name: Burgundy Elegance Hijab
description: Rich burgundy color with satin finish, ideal for autumn and winter styling. The deep color complements all skin tones.

name: Emerald Grace Hijab
description: Vibrant emerald green with geometric patterns, made from sustainable fabric. A modern twist on traditional design.

name: Lavender Serenity Hijab
description: Soft lavender with embroidered details, perfect for everyday elegance. The gentle color brings a sense of calm and grace.
